nodes.text: L9-7240 was the designation of a scout trooper who served the Galactic Empire on Kashyyyk. While stationed on Kashyyyk, L9-7240 was aboard an AT-AT engaging rebel forces led by Saw Gerrera. After a TIE fighter crashed into the walker they were in, L9-7240 was with other scout troopers and entered the passenger bay, where they reported that there were casualties. The former Jedi Padawan Cal Kestis entered the bay and killed L9-7240 and the others, before taking control of the AT-AT himself and attacking Imperial forces.
